vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Κλαύδιος, -ου, ὁ
Claudius;
__1. the Emperor: Act.11:28 18:2.
__2. A military tribune, C. Lysias: Act.23:26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.11.28
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Claudio: (1) Tiberio Claudio, emperador romano (41-54 d. C.) (HCH.11:28) ; (2) Claudio Lisias, oficial romano en Jerusalén (HCH.23:26)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革老丟 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "殘廢的"
1) 羅馬第四任皇帝,主後41年登基,最後被妻子毒死 (徒 11:28,18:2)
2) 耶路撒冷的一名羅馬官員 (徒 23:26)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
革老丢这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是"残废的"
1) 罗马第四任皇帝,主后41年登基,最后被妻子毒死(徒11:28,18:2 )
2) 耶路撒冷的一名罗马官员(徒23:26)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Cơ-lốt; Hoàng Đế Cơ-lau-đi-u. nguồn gốc: tiếng Latinh

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.23.26; also called Claudius at Act.23.26;
